channel.title: Abouts on FoorFoot Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on FoorFoot Portfolio

item.title: Me
item.author: fourfootstudios@protonmail.com (FoorFoot)
item.description: Hi, I’m Foor Foot. I’m a programmer. Programming languages I know are: C#, C++, Java and a bit of Python. I mainly develop micro controller projects using Arduino as well as projects with Raspberry Pi. Other than that, I make PC and mobile games using a game engine called Unity. I use C# with Unity to develop PC and Mobile (Android) games. As of right now, I’ve only released games I made for mobile on Google Play.
